name: Pavillon am Ufer
tagline: Café by day, bar by night on the Landwehr Canal
description: Located on the picturesque banks of the Landwehr Canal in Berlin-Kreuzberg, Pavillon am Ufer is a charming café and bar offering a diverse selection of quality coffee, delicious snacks, and Mediterranean-influenced delicacies. By day, enjoy our huge selection of good coffee, waffles with Nutella, tramezzini, quiches, and sandwiches. As evening falls, we transform into a cozy bar serving Aperol Spritz, wine, and cocktails.
